item.title: CVE-2024-30541|2024-03-31T18:30:26.528Z -- LWS -- LWS Optimize
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in LWS LWS Optimize.This issue affects LWS Optimize: from n/a through 1.9.1.
